item.title: Devops Project CI/CD With Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, K8s
item.description: The course The course is below. https://udemy.com/course/valaxy-devops/ Section 1: Introduction 1. Introduction 2. What do we cover 3. What is CI and CD 4. Resources to Setup Simple CI/CD Pipeline 5. Resources before starting Section 2: CI/CD pipeline using Git, Jenkins and Maven 6. Jenkins Installation 7. Run Frist Jenkins Job 8. Git Setup 9. Correct Git path 10. Maven Setup 11. Create first Maven job Section 3: Integrating Tomcat server in CI/CD pipeline 12. Tomcat Server setup 13.
